bio:
Raised in France and working in Brooklyn, Douglas Werner, owner and master fabricator at Oblik Studio Incorporated makes custom, ready-made freestanding furniture and accessories. These pieces are made from sustainably sourced or reclaimed metals, primarily steel, aluminum, stainless steel, bronze, brass and copper. He uses his own creativity in designing and fabricating luxury furnishings with clean, modern lines and a strong, old time, vintage feel.

“Growing up on the rustic coastline of Brittany, I was always fascinated with the corroding effects of time and the elements on metals. Beaches and coves are marked with the natural patina of steel, copper, bronze and aluminum wrecks left behind by maritime history,” says Douglas Werner. Oblik thrives to express the sensitive experience and beauty of exposed aging metal and the stories that it tells.

Oblik Studio combines functionality with modern and historical lines while using and combining different metals whenever possible. Working and dealing with the constraints of such tough and versatile materials can be a challenge, as well as an inspiration. My goal is to grow my business without sacrificing my strong belief in working locally and with unique highly detailed craftsmanship.
Each piece is unique, and variations may occur in color and texture due to the nature of the materials.

listings.title: I will teach you how to weld!
listings.description: I have a 1500 square ft shop with plenty of time on my hands! I would love to teach someone -- no matter what their background -- how to weld and my welding secrets!

listings.title: Advanced Welding
listings.description: For people who have been welding for a while but still don't feel like they've got what it takes to do professionally. I'm the guy to show you the tricks of the trade and get you prepped for your first job!

bio:
Robert Sevilla Naudon designs & fabricates architectural metals. I primarily create custom lighting designed by myself or by designers looking for UL rated lighting. I have been making a living thru art since 1989 & feel very privileged to be able to do so. I live in the Pacific Northwest with my wife & two boys. Everything I make is either Made-To-Order, or a One-Off prototype. If you are interested in design consultation contact me thru this website.

Sharing what I know is a natural part of the trade I am involved in. Without the help & the wisdom of my teachers I would not be where I am today…. I would be there in 5 years. Typically Hamlet Seekers are looking for an experience & not so much a class per se.

For example, some Seekers may ask:
to help complete a project they have started
to start a new project
just ask questions

If you are coming to my shop in Spokane WA and want to weld you will need to bring the following:
Long sleeve cotton shirts
Long denim pants
Leather Boots
Gloves
Comfortable safety googles, you will be wearing them the entire time you are in the shop

If you are coming with a project in mind, bring all supplies needed with you. Meaning, if your project is made of steel then bring the steel.

listings.title: Learn to craft metal chandeliers!
listings.description: This class will cover it all. Metal casting and black smithing, electrical wiring, and fun! I have free time on the weekends to teach anyone willing to learn from scratch.

bio:
Iron Mountain Forge is run by blacksmith, Carley Eisenberg, and is nestled in the mountains of Western North Carolina. She can design and forge anything from small hook racks and bottle openers to tables and rocking chairs. Though mainly focusing in steel, she is able to do some pieces in wood and glass as well.
Carley graduated from Miami University of Ohio with a Bachelors in Fine Arts in Interior Design with a concentration in Furniture Design. After spending some time making cabinets, she attended Rhode Island School of Design and received her Masters in Furniture Design with a concentration in metal.

listings.title: Sword Smithing
listings.description: Learn how how to cast and smith a sword with me. Iron Mountain Forge has a great forge that is available for our use, allowing us to have some of the best tools and environment to learn in.
